contextId.information: AT: "everything that people do" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_activepassive]])
contextId.quote: all the deeds that are done

contextId.information: AT: "forest where trees grew" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_activepassive]])
contextId.quote: forest where trees were grown

contextId.information: AT: "people will not remember the wise man for very long, just as they do not remember the fool for very long" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_activepassive]])
contextId.quote: the wise man, like the fool, is not remembered for very long

contextId.information: AT: "all the work that people do" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_activepassive]])
contextId.quote: all the work done

contextId.information: AT: "people cannot easily break a rope made with three strands" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_activepassive]])
contextId.quote: a three-strand rope is not quickly broken

contextId.information: AT: "people oppressing poor people and robbing them" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_activepassive]])
contextId.quote: the poor being oppressed and robbed

contextId.information: Possible meanings are 1) "no one buries him" or 2) "no one buries him properly." (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_activepassive]])
contextId.quote: he is not buried with honor

contextId.information: AT: "People have already named everything that exists" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_activepassive]])
contextId.quote: Whatever has existed has already been given its name

contextId.information: AT: "The more words that people speak" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_activepassive]])
contextId.quote: The more words that are spoken

contextId.information: AT: "every kind of work that people do" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_activepassive]])
contextId.quote: every kind of work that is done

contextId.information: AT: "something else that people do on the earth" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_activepassive]])
contextId.quote: something else that is done on the earth

contextId.information: AT: "the work that people do on the earth" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_activepassive]])
contextId.quote: the work that is done on the earth

contextId.information: Possible meanings are 1) "the work that God does under the sun" or 2) "the work that God allows people to do under the sun." (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_activepassive]])
contextId.quote: the work that is done under the sun

contextId.information: AT: "everything that people do" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_activepassive]])
contextId.quote: everything that is done

contextId.information: AT: "people forget them" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_activepassive]])
contextId.quote: their memory is forgotten

contextId.information: AT: "anything that people do under the sun" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_activepassive]])
contextId.quote: anything done under the sun

contextId.information: AT: "anoint your head with oil" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_activepassive]])
contextId.quote: your head anointed with oil

contextId.information: AT: "in the city, people found a poor, wise man" or "a poor, wise man lived in the city" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_activepassive]] and [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_idiom]])
contextId.quote: in the city was found a poor, wise man

contextId.information: Since the man was poor, the people did not appreciate the man's wisdom, nor honor him for his wisdom. AT: "people despise the poor man's wisdom" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_activepassive]])
contextId.quote: the poor man's wisdom is despised

contextId.information: AT: "Rulers give positions of leadership to fools" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_activepassive]])
contextId.quote: Fools are given leadership positions

contextId.information: AT: "when the voice of a bird startles men" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_activepassive]])
contextId.quote: when men are startled at the voice of a bird

contextId.information: "someone crushes the golden bowl" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_activepassive]])
contextId.quote: the golden bowl is crushed

contextId.information: "someone breaks the water wheel" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_activepassive]])
contextId.quote: the water wheel is broken
